name: Sugar Crush - Match 3 Games
description:
The sweetest and funniest match-3 puzzle game 2018
All you need to do is: Match candies, collect points, explore new land and have happy time.

A smart and brave Bear has landed on this mysterious candy jungle island. Try to catch new candy monster. We have to overcome many challenges along our way. Watch out for the monkeys!

SUGAR CRUSH FEATURES:
- Slide, swap, switch and match 3 candies and collect them
- Explore new lands
- Collecting more candies, you will earn sweeter bonus and match 3-star
- Match 4, 5 or more candies to create special booster and have more bonus
- Journey through 320+ brand new levels. Updates come out all the time with more levels!
- Play anywhere anytime: No need of Internet
- Completely FREE match-3 candy game
- Easy-to-play for kids & entertaining for adults.

Download this game now and enjoy this wild adventure. Good luck!
